If you're here at FAU because you got financial aid...
...which, by the way, was how I was able to help finance my college education;...
...that's how Michelle got her college education,...
...it benefits whatever company might end up hiring you...
If one of you goes on to become the next Steve Jobs or Mark Zuckerberg...
...or one of you discovers the next medical breakthrough,...
...think about all the people whose lives will be changed for the better.
We made an investment in you;...
...we'll get a return on the investment.
